storyInfo: Magallan became fascinated with the icefields after hearing a song when she was little. Many years later, her explorations of the icefields have brought scientific advancement and valuable friendship.

attributes.content: When Magallan was little, there was a small flower shop on the corner near her home. She liked to visit.
Children would often buy flowers there, and ask the aging owner all sorts of questions.
Magallan enjoyed a song that the old man sang.
In an endless snowfield—ah! There's the bloom of a nameless flower♪
attributes.name: Limping Old Man

attributes.content: And my friend a-lies there, oh, and a-watches the snow come down♪
attributes.name: Limping Old Man

attributes.content: What does it mean? Is there really a place outside Columbia where hot water turns to ice as soon as you pour it out?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Have you been to any other special places?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Oh, you're interested, are you?
attributes.name: Limping Old Man

attributes.content: That would be another story altogether.
attributes.name: Limping Old Man

attributes.content: The icefields start here. I've walked this path many times, but it always feels different. I've never been so excited before!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Let's see how much the engine can take. Good, it hasn't frozen up yet, good work, Engineering. Maybe we can use it on the way up the mountain too?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And we better look over our supplies... alright. We're ready!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Magallan, you know that since the expedition decades ago, no one has tried to go any further beyond.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: This is a valuable opportunity. Go as far as you can and bring back as much data as possible!
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Of course. This is my dream!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Going off the grid now. Magallan, over and out!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Are those footsteps?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Is someone there?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Whoa! Another ghost?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: W-Who's there?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Asbestos?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Who are you?
attributes.name: Office Operator

attributes.content: Hi, I'm...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: This kid followed me because he was worried about me going by myself, and he damned near froze to death. I'm taking him back.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: I'm Bard, trainee operator in the Rhodes Island office. Operator Asbestos was picking up some medicine from me.
attributes.name: Office Operator

attributes.content: According to regulations, I have to make sure that she leaves the office safely, but I got worried when she said she wanted to explore the icefields.
attributes.name: Office Operator

attributes.content: Well, we're almost to the fields. And they're no place for the inexperienced. Don't put your life at risk.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You know the way back. You can take it from here, I'm going with her.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Office Operator

attributes.content: My name is Magallan, and I'm an operator from Rhine Lab stationed at Rhodes Island. Here's my badge.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm on a mission for Rhine, with plenty of supplies for two, including medicine for treating Infected symptoms. Operator Asbestos will be safe with me!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh, you're an operator from HQ? Alright then, you definitely have plenty of experience.
attributes.name: Office Operator

attributes.content: But please return to the landship for a checkup after the trip, Operator Asbestos. I'll upload your data to the server.
attributes.name: Office Operator

attributes.content: Gah, fine.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Please be careful, Operator Magallan, and take care of Operator Asbestos.
attributes.name: Office Operator

attributes.content: I will. I'll take you part of the way. It's a pretty rough path.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So you went to the office for medication because you ran out in the field?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hehe, it's nice to have a familiar face on the trip.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But were you really coming to the icefields? Do you have enough supplies? If you only wanted to spook that guy, I'll send you right back.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...Just send me back.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ugh... forget it.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: I was gonna go into the icefields, but I'm nowhere as prepared as you are.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: I was in Columbia before this. I was headed back to the landship, but I didn't have enough medicine, so I got some by knocking out an office mission.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: I heard an old man talking about the icefields on the way, and it piqued my interest.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: An old man talking about the icefields? Have you heard a song that goes, 'In an endless snowfield—ah! There's the bloom of a nameless flower♪'?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: From the old man?
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: You must've been close to my home! How's the old man doing? He sells really pretty flowers!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hey, where are you going? We should be heading north.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Up the glacier.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: A glacier has to be formed under the right conditions to be fit for climbing. You need heavy snowfall in the winter and a mild summer. Otherwise, you get dangerous cracks.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You call the shots in the Black Flow, but this is the icefields.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I've been down this path hundreds of times as a Rhine field researcher. They send me out here because no one knows it better than me.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: If you try to strike out on your own, I'll—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hey, don't cover your ears! I'm serious!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Asbestos! Hey, Asbestos!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I heard you!!
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Look, I studied that ice pillar a few years ago.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: They're formed by intersecting cracks in the glaciers. They look solid from a distance, but you never know if they might suddenly collapse.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So we go around it. And we tie ourselves together with this safety cable. And you never, ever untie it under any circumstances.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Won't we drag the other one down if one of us slips?
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: If something happens to one of us, we can easily find the other and help out.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: There's no such thing as the individual on the icefields. An explorer joins her fate to the other, it's the only way to move forward.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Day by day, Magallan and Asbestos go deeper and deeper into the icefields.
Their interactions grow briefer as they save their strength to face the constant snowstorms.

attributes.text: 'Why do I challenge my limits? What will I find, what will I get, and what will remain?'

attributes.content: Everyone knows it gets more dangerous the deeper you go. No one wants to lose her life until she sees what she truly wanted to see.
Tie the icepick tight! Hook onto the cracks in the rocks if you slip—don't untie the rope!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You'll fall too!
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: I still have the drone. Shut up and listen for its signal, grab it, and relax your legs. One, two, three!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Rrrah!
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Go up and find a place with good footing, then tie the rope on the screw so I can come up.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Done!
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Good. Now, I—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: —Whoa!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Gotcha!
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Coming up! The drone—
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It fell.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Whew, at least we're alive. Why did you try to untie the rope?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: We have rescue drones. Never untie the rope! Let me make a mark here in case someone else comes by...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: A month passes.

Magallan has seen countless records. The dreams people have about the icefields come in many different forms: wealth, knowledge, power... but all she cares about is her childhood dream, the story of the song.
Beneath their feet, the icefield is no longer infinite and boundless, but a conquest made one step at a time.
Still, the end is nowhere in sight. It is hidden away in the snow, and anyone on the snow is at the mercy of the avalanches.
Footprints are gradually covered by the falling snow, but humans continue to tread on stubbornly.
Are you ok? How are the drones?
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Down to the last one. Doesn't look like it'll last long though.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Sensors detect a big rock ahead. Great place for a rest. With the data and samples we collected, we might want to set up an outpost here!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Looks like our explorer has a beautiful dream.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: ...Is this the rock you were talking about?
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Yup! Even bigger than I thought. You don't see ice crystals this big very often. It's a miracle to have it preserved like that.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: There are carvings on it. Are those somebody's initials?
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Carvings? How rude! Don't they know we leave only footprints?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But I don't know of any explorers who came here after the last icefield landing... hold on.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Magallan goes around the rock and observes the carvings from downwind.
I remember these initials from the records...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Could it be...?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...Asbestos, I think those who came before us are buried here.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Magallan starts digging at the snow and ice, first with her gloved hands, then with a shovel, then with her hands again.
Slowly, a frozen body emerges from beneath the snow, then another, and another. Asbestos joins in to help, and they excavate four bodies, laying them side-by-side on the snow.
I heard a team got in the icefields decades ago. I just didn't expect to find them here.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: We can't bring the bodies back, but I guess we can dig a proper grave. And we'll send their personal effects to their families.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The explorers' faces are young, frozen in time beneath the snow.
Their discoveries have inspired countless who came after them to continue to explore the icefields, including those who found their remains so they could see light of day one last time.
I think that's gonna be me, dying as an explorer.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Sometimes I ask myself if I'm willing to lose my life on an expedition, if it means that science takes another step forward?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I've never found the answer, but I know that these pioneers before us were willing to go, no matter what.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I can't imagine the courage it would take. I would miss my parents and my friends; I don't want to lose my life, or lose my friends.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's a noble thing to sacrifice for one's ideals, but I don't want to see any friends die, as long as I can do anything about it.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: The wind's died down. I'll put up a tent.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: 'The skipper lost his toes to frostbite, then the entire right leg. Our sled broke down five days ago. Still he ploughs ahead. 'Twenty-three years!' he cries.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'We started with twenty-four. Now we're down to five, and it doesn't look like we're going to make it back.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'I can't feel my lower body anymore. That's how the skipper lost his leg. It just broke off with no blood at all. I can still move my hands, though.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'The skipper would have yelled at me, breathing white fog through his beard, the water vapor turning to ice on his beard strands. But he'll forgive me in the end.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'I'll write our names on this rock.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'Peary, Abigail, Merlot, Abel, Colt. We write our names here on this great rock of the icefields, so that our deeds may live on forever.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'May nature forgive this final deed of the dying.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'It's time for me to sleep. Merlot closed her eyes a few minutes ago. It's a shame that we never made it to our wedding, but the snow makes for a fine dress.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'Goodnight, my love.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Merlot was Columbian. Abigail was from Kjerag. The team came from many different countries...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It was always my dream to be part of a team like that.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: There's something else on the page...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'In an endless snowfield—ah! There's the bloom of a nameless flower.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'And my friend a-lies there, oh, and a-watches the snow come down.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So they knew the song too.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.text: In an endless snowfield—ah! There's the bloom of a nameless flower♪
And my friend a-lies there, oh, and a-watches the snow come down♪

attributes.content: Be at peace.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hiss—Hiss—
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: Your communicator has been hissing non-stop. Can't you do something about it?
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: My communicator? I haven't had a signal for days. Why would it make any noise at all?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Wait, is it picking up something?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Got the photo&%Maggy#@Thanks. Auroraa#&very beautif#¥stunning sorry can't*%better words@%%also saw#@
attributes.name: Communicator

attributes.content: I sent some photos to Aurora while I was exploring the icefields. Is she answering?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: How did we get that message here? We're so far from Rhodes Island!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's a miracle!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Aurora... the Ursus girl?
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Yup! She's amazing! The transmission is fragmented, but it's definitely a transmission alright!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Guys! I got a transmission here, that should be impossible! But it's from my friend, Aurora!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: She's a really cute white-haired Ursus girl from Kjerag. We made a promise to explore the icefields together when she gets better.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hehe, thank you. It must be your doing that I got this message!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Asbestos! Aurora sent over some cheese fondue packs. It's a delicacy from her country. All we need to do is heat them up.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Wanna try? Aurora says it's perfect for cold weather. Let's eat up before the next snowstorm!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Cheese fondue? I won't stop you.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: I think I have indigestion.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I could never get used to it.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: It's so rich... is this what they eat in Kjerag? In Columbia, we just put a little cheese on our hamburgers.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm eating my own food.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: I can't finish all of this...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's not for Rim Billitonians. I'll see how far north we can go.
attributes.name: Asbestos

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Day 29. Taught Asbestos the song. She sang it well. I'll teach Aurora next time!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Attempted to continue northward. Arrived at the waypoint today.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Finished going through the previous team's belongings. They contain information on many potential points of interest. I'll finish my forebears' unfinished work.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And realize my own dream.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Day 92. The new equipment is operating smoothly. Drone repairs are complete.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Attempted to progress north, but couldn't reach our waypoint due to inclement weather. We marked the furthest point we could reach; glacier crevasses beyond that point prevent us from progressing further.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: We have surveyed most of the objectives identified by the previous team. We discovered several ruins and have finished collecting samples. We have marked the remaining locations that are out of reach.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The newest discovery is...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Day 132, our last day in the icefields.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: We did not reach the northmost waypoint, but with only one drone remaining and our gear severely damaged, we need to get replacements and prepare for the trip back.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I asked Asbestos and Aurora what they think when they see the icefields: conquering nature, or seeking one's own self, or joy at achieving a goal?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I came here to get closer to the story of the song I heard in my childhood.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's a choice that many have a hard time understanding. Asbestos mentioned getting into a big fight with her parents, and Aurora argued with her family too.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm lucky to have parents who supported me, which allowed me to keep going despite my setbacks along the way.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The icefields are my dream. I want to make my dream come true, like those who came before me, who have no regrets about making the icefields their final resting place.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I have no regrets either.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...It's time to go.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So only the captain of the team made it back...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Yes. His name was Peary, and the data he brought back were instrumental to further exploration. Many hail him as the first pioneer of the icefields.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: It means a lot that you brought back their things, even if the data may not be so important these days.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Rhine Lab will contact the authorities. We can leave the search for the next-of-kin to them. If there's no next-of-kin, their effects can be donated to museums, and we can get the media to hype things up as well.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Honoring them can only be a positive thing for the government and Rhine. Even though we didn't reach the northmost point, people will still know that Rhine has broken its own record again.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: The positive press will make better projects easier in the future. Great job, Magallan.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: All I wanted is to realize my dream, Polly...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Of course; it's my dream too. But it's also a job, and you should take some time off after you take care of what you have on hand.
attributes.name: Researcher

attributes.content: Mom, how's the old man with a limp who runs the flower shop around the corner? The one that I used to go to when I was little.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That crepe shop I used to eat at hasn't changed at all.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ah... the owner passed away a few months ago. His kids are thinking about selling the shop.
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: I knew you were going to ask. He planted a lot of flowers on that field that you used to play on.
attributes.name: Father

attributes.content: They're in full bloom now, the entire field is covered.
attributes.name: Father

attributes.content: No need to hold things back if you're feeling sad. Want to have a look after dinner?
attributes.name: Mother

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Here we are... the flowers look so nice.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Is this the old man's headstone?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'In an endless snowfield—ah! There's the bloom of a nameless flower.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'And my friend a-lies there, oh, and a-watches the snow come down.'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'Here ends my story. —Peary'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: 'Peary'?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Mr. Peary... I met your team on the icefields.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I went 800m past where I found them. Next time, I'm sure I can go even deeper.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: There was a friend with me. It was just the two of us, but I've made a lot of new friends. One of them, by the name of Aurora, is really interested in the icefields.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It all started when... I became interested in the icefields after hearing your song. Now I've reached a place that you and your team never did.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Thank you. I...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Magallan wanted to leave something behind, but all she found was the notebook she carries with her.
There are no difficult formulas, no deep insights, only a true record of her feelings out on the icefields, and simple sketches of the sights she saw.
She takes it out and places it on the flower field. The grass and flowers embrace it, and the breeze flips its pages open.
In an endless snowfield—ah! There's the bloom of a nameless flower♪
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And my friend a-lies there, oh, and a-watches the snow come down♪
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's getting late. I should go; it's a long way back to my house.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'll never stop exploring the icefields. I've sent your team's personal effects back to their families. Goodbye.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hey! Look what I told you! There's a really pretty flower field here that not many people know about!
attributes.name: Active Child

attributes.content: Wow! It's so beautiful!
attributes.name: Running Child

attributes.content: There are even more flowers up ahead! Have you ever climbed that rock? I was the first one to climb it!
attributes.name: Active Child

attributes.content: Race you there!
attributes.name: Running Child

attributes.content: Hey, did someone drop a notebook?
attributes.name: Singing Child

attributes.content: Oh!
attributes.name: Singing Child

attributes.content: Wow... so that's what the northern icefields are like!
attributes.name: Singing Child

attributes.content: Sounds incredible...
attributes.name: Singing Child
